statements: SELECT * FROM protein_interactions;
SELECT protein_a, protein_b FROM protein_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'physical';
SELECT protein_a, protein_b FROM protein_interactions WHERE protein_a = 'ABC' AND protein_b = 'DEF';
SELECT * FROM protein_interactions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM protein_interactions;
SELECT * FROM protein_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'activation';
SELECT protein_a, protein_b FROM protein_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'inhibition' ORDER BY protein_b ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM protein_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'binding';
SELECT protein_a, interaction_type FROM protein_interactions WHERE protein_b LIKE '%kinase%' ORDER BY protein_a DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM protein_interactions WHERE protein_a = 'BRCA1' OR protein_b = 'BRCA1';
SELECT * FROM protein_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'binding';
SELECT protein1, protein2 FROM protein_interaction WHERE protein1 = 'ABC' AND protein2 = 'XYZ';
SELECT id, interaction_type FROM protein_interaction WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM drug_target ORDER BY target_type DESC;
SELECT protein1, interaction_type FROM protein_interaction WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%inhibitor%' AND protein1 = 'DEF';
SELECT protein1, protein2 FROM protein_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'binding';
SELECT * FROM drug_target WHERE target_type = 'kinase' ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein1, protein2, interaction_type FROM protein_interaction WHERE protein1 = 'AKT' OR protein2 = 'EGFR';
SELECT * FROM drug_target WHERE target_type LIKE '%inhibitor%' AND protein_id IN (SELECT id FROM protein_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'binding');

SELECT protein1 AS source, protein2 AS target, interaction_type AS type FROM protein_interaction UNION SELECT protein2 AS source, protein1 AS target, interaction_type AS type FROM protein_interaction;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name FROM proteins ORDER BY gene_name;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 2;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name FROM proteins WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT drug_name, target_name FROM drug_targets ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM proteins WHERE gene_name = 'ABC';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'binding';
SELECT p.protein_name, d.target_name FROM proteins p JOIN drug_targets d ON p.protein_id = d.protein_id;
SELECT p.protein_name, i.interaction_type FROM proteins p JOIN interactions i ON p.protein_id = i.protein_id_1;
SELECT * FROM protein_interactions;
SELECT protein_id, interaction_score FROM protein_interactions ORDER BY interaction_score DESC;
SELECT drug_name, description FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT protein_id, target_protein_id, interaction_score FROM protein_interactions WHERE target_protein_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM protein_targets WHERE function = 'Enzyme';
SELECT * FROM protein_interactions;
SELECT protein_id, target_protein_id, interaction_score FROM protein_interactions ORDER BY interaction_score DESC;
SELECT protein_name, function FROM protein_targets WHERE function = 'Enzyme';
SELECT drug_name, description FROM drugs WHERE drug_name LIKE '%pain%';
SELECT * FROM drug_targets WHERE target_type IN ('Receptor', 'Enzyme');
SELECT * FROM Protein WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name FROM Protein WHERE protein_function = 'enzyme';
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM Protein WHERE protein_function LIKE '%transport%';
SELECT protein_name FROM Protein ORDER BY protein_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'binding' ORDER BY protein_id1, protein_id2 ASC;
SELECT * FROM Protein WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name, protein_function FROM Protein WHERE protein_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'binding';
SELECT drug_name, drug_type FROM Drug ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT target_name, target_function FROM Target WHERE target_function LIKE '%inhibitor%';
